name: Sushi, Inc.
description:
Welcome to the shop, boss! In this adorable idle game, you’re the manager of a sushi restaurant run by a bunch of dedicated animals serving the most delicious food in town!

The restaurant is open for business! Get new crew members from bunnies to foxes! Make the best sushi and find new recipes for your kitchens! You can even open new locations as your restaurants grow famous!

Rice and shine as the best sushi maker in town!

FEATURES
● Manage your Restaurant and Kitchens as you expand your business.
● Earn crates to unlock rewards, collect powerful new recipes, and upgrade existing ones.
● Hire unique managers who give special limited time boosts and power-ups to your locations.
● Expand to locations across the country!
● Build and upgrade your recipe collection with dozens of your favorite sushi to sell.
● Renovate your locations to boost their income and attract bigger customers.
● Check in everyday for amazing rewards


Please note Sushi Inc is a free-to-play experience, but some game items are available for purchase using real money.
A network connection is also required.


Got any problems or suggestions?

Feel free to send a message to
support@metamoki.com
